data: After the termination of a three months' struggle on the floor of 'Change, resulting in the rout of his adversaries, who had counted on an easy acquisition of his heritage in the P. & S. system, Calvert Carter was grateful for that particular armchair in the reading-room of the Racquet Club.
browsing: culture/civilization/society|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: adventure|category: novels
